channel.title: Music on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Welcome

item.title: Iros 2019
item.description: Participation with team Snobots for University of Manitoba in IROS 2019 in Macau. We programmed two robots to play music together with a human! Leaned more about OpenCV, visual servoing, inverse kinematics, UDP connections, human-robot-interaction and music synchronization. Qualification video We got 2nd place among 6 teams! The prize was a hand sponsored by Seed Robotics UM Press Here are some solo videos of each part of the performance: Oscar - Sound check “Billie Jean”
